General.Name: Delta Plus Group SA
General.Description: Delta Plus Group engages in design, manufacture, and distribution of a range of personal protective equipment worldwide. It provides head protection products, including eyewear, skull, hearing, and respiratory protection products; and hand protection products, such as cut, thermal, chemical, mechanical, and craft man's protection gloves. The company offers body protection products comprising work wear, technical wear, outdoor wear, and disposable wear products; and foot protection products consisting of sport, outdoor, boots, and indoor products, as well as ladies and gentlemen accessories. In addition, it provides fall protection products, including body support products, fall arrester systems, anchorage-work positioning products, connecting system products, and suspension and rescue services. Delta Plus Group was founded in 1977 and is based in Apt, France.
